Text: The md5 file allows you to watch your movie AND eat popcorn simultaneously! Pretty nifty, huh?!

I'm DLing now, but I have a question... Why have a sample with the full version?

It uses an additional 100MB, and makes no sense to have in the first place...

@btgbullseye
You can download the sample and check the video quality, you don't need to download it.
